text: Grand Valley State University is a public university in Allendale, Michigan. It is close to Grand Rapids, Michigan. The university was established in 1960. It has other campuses in Downtown Grand Rapids and in Holland. It also teaches classes at local community colleges at Muskegon and Traverse City. ==References== ==Other websites== *Grand Valley State University official website Category:Colleges and universities in Michigan Category:1960 establishments in the United States Category:1960s establishments in Michigan
title: Grand Valley State University
